title: Total FSI on plot area may be allowed to be exceeded upto 4 for construction of Transit Camp tenements for SRA
clause_text: Total FSI on plot area may be allowed to be exceeded upto 4 for construction of Transit Camp tenements for SRA.
section: Provision relating to Permanent Transit Camp Tenements for Slum Rehabilitation Scheme implemented on open plot / non-slum plot.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
